packages.name: AnyTones - Ringtone Maker
packages.shortDescription: You will never have to pay for another ringtone! AnyTones allows you to create unlimited custom ringtones, text tones, and alerts using songs in your iPhone's music library, MP3s you download, and music you record. Use the sleek interface to adjust your ringtone length. Then swipe the audio wave to select a short clip, and your ringtone is ready. It's that easy! Get started creating custom ringtones and text tones for everyone in your address book.
packages.author: UnlimApps
